caption: "Do you know Dartmoor?" He is asked. Dartmoor is an astonishing place, desolate yet beautiful like no other. He shows no interest and moves on to the next topic. Even though the location is a place where we used to take frequent walks, he remains indifferent and the conversation progresses swiftly, at a pace suitable yet relatively fast, with the mention of the wondrous, uniquely desolate and beautiful Dartmoor left hanging as a mere interjection in the exchange.
